content: An article on 5 May about the school shooting massacre in Serbia included a photograph that was said to show the 13-year-old suspect posing with his fingers in the shape of a gun. The photograph, which had the boy’s face blurred, was first published in the media in Serbia. However, we have since been informed that photograph was not the suspect, and it has been removed.

To report an inaccuracy, please email corrections@mailonline.co.uk. To make a formal complaint under IPSO rules please go to www.mailonline.co.uk/readerseditor where you will find an easy-to-use complaints form. You can also write to Readers' Editor, MailOnline, Northcliffe House, 2 Derry Street, London W8 5TT or contact IPSO directly at ipso.co.uk
